extendedIngredients.name: american cheese
extendedIngredients.originalString: 8 oz American Cheese Slices or Velveeta (I used low fat)

extendedIngredients.name: crackers
extendedIngredients.originalString: Club Crackers, crushed with pats of butter (optional topping)

extendedIngredients.name: whole wheat spaghetti noodles
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1 lbs spaghetti noodles, cooked (I used whole wheat, be sure to under-cook by about 4-5 minutes.)
metaInformation: (I used , be sure to under-cook by 4-5 minutes.)

recipes.title: Chicken Tetrazzini

winePairing.pairingText: Chardonnay, Pinot Noir, and Sauvignon Blanc are my top picks for Chicken. White meat is typically paired with white wine as to not overpower the flavor of the meat, so chardonnay and sauvignon blanc are safe choices. Chicken prepared with a tomato sauce or certainly a red wine sauce can and should be served with a red like a pinot noir. The Downton Abbey Countess of Grantham Chardonnay with a 5 out of 5 star rating seems like a good match. It costs about 16 dollars per bottle.

productMatches.title: Downton Abbey Countess of Grantham Chardonnay
productMatches.description: Our Downton Abbey Chardonnay displays lovely aromas of tropical fruits and subtle oak on the nose, which give way to flavors of citrus and fresh-cut pineapple on a soft, silky palate. The wine's bright characters and luscious mouthfeel continue through a clean, medium finish. The beautifully balanced and food-friendly bottling is the perfect wine choice for you most regal gatherings or spontaneous get-togethers.

recipes.instructions: In a large stockpot, saute onions in olive oil, add mushrooms half way through cooking. Remove from pan and set aside. In the same pot, melt butter on low.  Whisk in flour and milk until smooth. Add cheese and cook until melted. Add mushroom soup; cook until combined. Stir in shredded chicken and mushroom/onion mixture. Add noodles and carefully toss with tongs.  Try not to mush or tear noodles. Pour into a 9×13 casserole dish.  Optional Topping: Top with club crackers, and pats of butter. Bake at 375 degrees for 35 minutes, or until bubbly.

steps.step: In a large stockpot, saute onions in olive oil, add mushrooms half way through cooking.
Remove from pan and set aside. In the same pot, melt butter on low.
Whisk in flour and milk until smooth.
Add cheese and cook until melted.
Add mushroom soup; cook until combined. Stir in shredded chicken and mushroom/onion mixture.
Add noodles and carefully toss with tongs.  Try not to mush or tear noodles.
Pour into a 9×13 casserole dish.  Optional Topping: Top with club crackers, and pats of butter.
Bake at 375 degrees for 35 minutes, or until bubbly.
